command.reactionroles.desc.content:
You must provide one of these options (`<action>`): `add|create|setup`,`remove`,`list`,`flag`,`move`,`fix`
*(add, create and setup all do the same)*

And if you know the syntax you can provide `[args]` right away,
otherwise follow the prompts.

All of the commands have prompts and will guide you **EXCEPT**
the flag commands, unfortunately the way these are done its
impossible to add prompts to them and you'll have to send all
arguments at once *(%CUSTOM_PREFIX%rr flag add flag messageID)*, otherwise it
will just tell you to resend the command.

**If you kick/ban %BOT_USERNAME% your data will be
deleted after 7d and cannot be recovered.**

**WARNING:** the `%BOT_USERNAME%` role must be above all roles you
intend to give out, otherwise it wont work.
command.reactionroles.args.start:
What action would you like to perform?

`add|create|setup`,`remove`,`list`,`flag`,`move`,`fix`
command.reactionroles.args.retry:
Sorry, I didnt quite get that, what would you like to do?

`add|create|setup`,`remove`,`list`,`flag`,`move`,`fix`
command.reactionroleflagsadd.desc.conten:
You must provide one of these flags (`<flag>`): `selfdestruct`,`verify`,`lock`,`reverse`

SelfDestruct is the only flag that takes in options, example:
`%CUSTOM_PREFIX%rr flag add selfdestruct 10 messageID`

The number input determines at how many reactions
the message is going to- well... self destruct.

`Verify` flag will only allow the roles to be given out, not taken away.
`Lock` flag will lock the reaction from giving out or removing any roles.
`Reverse` flag will remove roles when the user reacts and give roles when they remove a reaction.

**WARNING: You must send all arguments at once, unfortunately,
the way this command works doesnt allow for prompts.**
command.reactionroleflagsadd.args.sdflag: Minimum cannot be lower then `1` or higher then `1000`
command.reactionroleflagsadd.args.messag: What message would you like to add your flag to?
Sorry, I didnt quite get that, what message would you like to add your flag to?
command.reactionroleflagsadd.noFlags.con:
You need to give me at least one flag to add.
Please re-send or edit your message.

*%CUSTOM_PREFIX%rr flag add `selfdestruct/verify/lock/reverse` message*
command.reactionroleflagsadd.incompatibl: To use other flags please remove the **Self Destruct** flag from your message.
command.reactionroleflagsadd.noRR: That message doesn't have any **Reaction Roles** attached to it.
command.reactionroleflagsremove.desc.con:
You must provide one of these flags (`<flag>`): `selfdestruct`,`verify`,`lock`,`reverse`

**WARNING: You must send all arguments at once, unfortunately,
the way this command works doesnt allow for prompts.**

Sorry, I didnt quite get that, what message would you like to remove your flag from?
You need to give me at least one flag to remove.
Please re-send or edit your message.

*%CUSTOM_PREFIX%rr flag remove `selfdestruct/verify/lock/reverse` message
command.reactionroleflagsremove.noRR: That message doesn't have any **Reaction Roles** attached to it.
command.reactionroleadd.desc.content:
You must provide all arguments in this command but you can let it
guide you and send arguments step by step.

**WARNING:** the `%BOT_USERNAME%` role must be above all roles you
intend to give out, otherwise it wont work.

command.reactionroleadd.args.emojiid.sta: Now I need an **emoji**, the one thats going to be displayed as your "role avatar" *(only custom emoji are allowed rn)*
command.reactionroleadd.args.emojiid.ret: Sorry I didnt quite get that, I need the emoji you'd like to use *(only custom emoji are allowed rn)*
command.reactionroleadd.args.roleid.star: And finally I need the **role**, you can ping the role or just send the **role id**
